full_text: 8041-456 Jumper Pattern Spanish English French German Italian Dutch Pattern PDF Danish It is worked in the round from top down on circular needles and is seamless. It is started at the neck-line, working with right side facing, distributing the increases throughout the depth of the yoke as far as the sleeves. The sleeve stitches are then left on hold and then brought back into the work later. Sizes / Measurements -a) M -b) L -c) XL -d) XXL Finished bust circumference: \–a) 100 cm –b) 110 cm –c) 118 cm –d) 128 cm \–a) 39 3/8” –b) 43 1/4” –c) 46 1/2” –d) 50 3/8” Svarende til str.: -a) 36-38 -b) 40-42 -c) 44-46 -d) 48-50 GRÖSSEN: –a) 36-38 –b) 40-42 –c)44-46 –d) 48-50 UK size: –a) 8-10 –b) 12-14 –c) 16-18–d) 20-22 US size: –a) 4-6 –b) 8-10 –c) 12-14–d) 16-18 TALLAS / TAILLES / MATEN: –a) 38-40 –b) 42-44 –c) 46-48 –d) 50-52 TAGLIE: –a) 42-44 –b) 46-48 –c) 50-52 –d) 54-56 Material Katia Concept Bellino, col. 205 - Red-Lemon yellow-Green-Blue 2 balls for all sizes Needles and notions: 3mm/US Size 3 circular needles with 40, 60, and 80 cm (16”, 24”, and 32”) cables 8 Stitch markers
